original_text: When they planted seeds to grow food, their enemies would attack them. The Midianites, Amalekites and people from the east would come to rob them.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 파종한 때면 미디안과 아말렉과 동방 사람들이 치러 올라와서

sentences.original_text: When they planted seeds to grow food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 음식을 자라게 하기 위해 씨앗을 심을 때

sentences.original_text: The Midianites, Amalekites and people from the east
sentences.korean_translation: 미디안 사람들, 아말렉 사람들과 동방 사람들
